document_data.name: Ido Kunarakuai
document_data.mainbody: '''Ido Kunarakuai''' was a judge in [[Wa]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Ido Kunarakuai was the chief justice of the executive [[hyojosho]] court in [[Uwaji]]. He had been in that position for twenty years. He was so totally devoted to his career that he neglected his family. His wife divorced from him in [[1347 DR]] and all his three daughters worked as [[geisha]] in [[Semmishi]].
document_data.Personality: Kunarakuai was a wise and stern man, appreciated by both nobility and commoners for his common sense approach to the law. He greatly regretted the problems with his family.
